001package io.cyborgcode.roa.db.annotations;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.extensions.DbHookExtension;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.extensions.DbTestExtension;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.annotation.FrameworkAdapter;
006import java.lang.annotation.ElementType;
007import java.lang.annotation.Retention;
008import java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy;
009import java.lang.annotation.Target;
010import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ExtendWith;
011
012/**
013 * Marks a test class as a database-related test.
014 *
015 * <p>This annotation integrates database testing functionality into test classes.
016 * It ensures database connections are properly managed by applying the
017 * {@link DbTestExtension}, which automatically closes connections after test execution.
018 *
019 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
020 */
021@ExtendWith({DbTestExtension.class, DbHookExtension.class})
022@Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
023@Target({ElementType.TYPE})
024@FrameworkAdapter(basePackages = {"io.cyborgcode.roa.db"})
025@SuppressWarnings("checkstyle:AbbreviationAsWordInName")
026public @interface DB {
027}
